name: pixelfed Dark Mode (WIP)
description: I prefer dark mode for most sites, but the dark mode style for pixelfed (at least on pixelfed.de) is problematic and has poor accessibility. This WIP style boosts contrast, making text easier to read. There's still plenty more to be done, but it's a start!
additional_info:
v1.0.0
- increase contrast on various controls and text
